text:
"Eega" (in Telugu;;;;) is a 2012 movie directed by S.S. Rajamouli. It stars Nani, Samantha and Kannada actor Sudeep. The movie was released on 6 July 2012. It received positive reviews and set records.
In Tamil it was released as "Naan Ee" (). It was simultaneously released in Telugu and Tamil.
Plot.
Nani has loved Bindu for two years. Sudeep kills Nani for Bindu. Then Nani is reborn as a fly and kills Sudeep.
History.
The movie was planned by director S.S. Rajamouli 14 years back when his father gave the idea. Due to some technical reasons, the movie didn't start its shooting until 29 July 2010. That was after the director released his 8th movie "Maryada Rammana".
